description: This file contains shell scripts and snippets for configuring syslog-ng within a build environment, including functions to generate configuration files, update constants, filters, destinations, logs, and properties, as well as conditional logic based on device properties.

methods.name: generate_syslog_ng_config
methods.description: Main function that orchestrates the generation and updating of syslog-ng configuration components.

methods.name: create_metadata_file
methods.description: Aggregates metadata and filter files, removing duplicates, and appends device-specific service entries based on device properties.

methods.name: update_constants
methods.description: Updates the syslog-ng configuration with version info, log paths, and predefined templates, creating configuration directories and files as needed.

methods.name: update_filters
methods.description: Reads filter definitions, associates them with metadata, and writes filter rules to the configuration.

methods.name: update_destination
methods.description: Sets up destination rules in the syslog-ng configuration based on metadata and filter definitions.

methods.name: update_log
methods.description: Adds logging rules, optionally including SSL endpoint logs, and configures log rates and fallbacks based on metadata tags.

methods.name: clear_tmp_files
methods.description: Removes temporary filter and metadata directories to clean up before regeneration.

methods.name: update_properties
methods.description: Appends a property enabling syslog-ng in the device properties file.
